Introducing the IBM z16 7 1.2.2 CPC drawers The IBM z16 A01 can be configured with up to four CPC drawers (three in the A Frame and one in the B Frame). Each CPC drawer contains the following elements:  Telum processor chips that use Extreme ultraviolet (EUV) process with 7 nm silicon lithography technology. Each processor chip consists of eight PU cores. Two processor chips are packaged in the dual-chip module (DCM).  DCMs Four DCMs that contain 64 physical cores per drawer interconnected (each
